Articles.Content:
Explorer pack v 1.0 (STOCK)

NEW!

Explorer Pack provides a basic stock for Sandbox and Science or Career mode, now with more stocks:

-2 Robotics planes

-Monopropeller Tugs

-Monopropeller Center

-Lander With skycrane+Shield

-3 landers for Caarer Mode (1 cheap, 1 Medium and 1 High) for your budget!

And the default Stocks:

-1 rover+Skycrane

-2 landers With and Without panels

Thanks and, of course, Comment and i can die happy (not now because i am Kerbalized)

Link: http://www./download/vd9ckwq73rdbvcs/Explorers+Pack.rar

Rover landing in Duna

Lander with panels

Lander without panels

Edited August 7, 2014 by Sconaron
fixed image links/new Stocks

Welcome to the forum. Try reading some of the forum rules and guidelines.

No pics, no clicks. Also, if these are just ships, put them in the Spacecraft Exchange.

Use of emoticons, especially on the thread name, is generally looked down upon. Use Emoticons in moderation.

Yeah, please put these in the spacecraft exchange, also you really need screenshots/videos.

You want to present better too.

Thanks, my problem is, i speak spanish, and i dont understand much the english, but, thanks for your comprention

Edited July 13, 2014 by Sconaron
There is no link, probably got removed by moderators since you have no pictures.
how i can put images, i need copy url`s but, i cant put images from my computer, help plz

How to post images is described in the Forum FAQs in the Welcome Aboard forum. Since this is a set of crafts, you might also request having this thread moved to the Spacecraft Exchange forum. You can ask the moderators to do that here.

Hi! Welcome to the forums!

(Please don't die! Keep kerbaling!)

Indeed the posting of craft really fits better in the Spacecraft Exchange forum, so off we go!

Also--folks, "no pix no clix" is *satire*, used on people who have that attitude. Or so I've always seen it. While pictures would be great, let's not harsh on a new person (who is not as experienced in English anyway) sharing their love of the game in the form of crafts.

Edited July 14, 2014 by NathanKell

Hey Sconaron,

Thanks for sharing your creations with us. They are looking good so far.

I went ahead and fixed your picture links. I left your old ones in the post so you can see the difference. No worries about the location, looks like Nathan fixed you up. Feel free to look around, you will get a feeling for where everything is.

Welcome to the forums,

-Claw
Thanks for let me enter in the forum, now i can create much crafts!

Well, here are my impressions

Rover: another curiosity-like-light Duna car

Landers: woo, theese are way better.

They do have a look of Viking landers, from the 70-s. Could you describe here some specific info on their resources, landing style and equipment? 'Cuz my mission ti Eve almost failed because of high gravity, and your stuff should sustain that... I think

Anyway, landers are good!
Yeah, I love the landers, the panels mounted on the cubic struts. On another tangent, welcome to the forum!

yeah, the rover is bad, because the center of mass is irregular, i am fixing this, just wait me, and of course, try my new stocks (The same link and tell me.

yeah, the rover is bad, because the center of mass is irregular, i am fixing this, just wait me, and of course, try my new stocks (The same link and tell me)
yeah, i am fixing this, try my new plane, download in the same link, in eve, is perfect! and fly, of course
Get a low orbit on eve (100k-120k) and decrease the orbit on 75k, and you can land soft on eve :-)
